metadata.title: First Time Tutorial
metadata.description: Interactive tutorial for learning the basics of logical deduction gameplay

problems.customer_flavor: Welcome! Let me show you how to solve logic puzzles.
natural_language_premises: If the cat is hungry (P), then it meows (Q).
problems.solution: Translate: P = 'The cat is hungry', Q = 'The cat meows'. Apply Modus Ponens: from "P → Q" and "P", conclude "Q".
interpretation_hints: Identify the condition and what follows from it
The condition is met, so the consequence is true
problems.hint: First, translate the natural language statements into logical notation. Then use the Modus Ponens (MP) rule.
